overview: I Want To Explore" VIDEO - Part 2 By Cathy Friedlander For VIDEO SAMPLES AND PHOTOS go to: http://www.2kingdoms.net/i-want-to-explore.html "I Want To Explore" is a kids-and-family-friendly creation adventure video in 2 parts. Part 2 features the Biblical Flood of Noah's day. Together with Scripture, polystrate fossils, and some lessons from the Mount St. Helens volcanic eruption, this video gives good scientific reasons for a young earth and global flood.
title: I want to Explore" - Part 2
